page.title: 19SCHOOL CLUBS AND SPORTS
page.content: On Tuesday after school we have {Computer Club}which lasts until 5.00PM.{Computer Club}is for fourth years only and it consists of making programes and typing them into the computer and every month we have a games night. {Gym Club}is usually on two nights a week.We have four groups which go down in order of ability starting with the less experienced in{B.A.G.A 4}and going up to the more experienced in{ {B.A.G.A 1}. In our school the girls have a{Netball {Team}and a{Rounders Team}.The boys have a{Football Team,Rugby Team}and a{ {Cricket Team.}We also have mixed teams these are as follows:{Athletics,Cross {Country,Tug of War}and a{Swimming {Team. } {B.A.G.A.=British Amateur Gymnastics {Award.
